DataElement.preferredName: Behavioral Intervention Prior 12 Weeks Change Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not there have been any changes to the behavioral interventions in the previous 12 weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Behavioral Intervention Prior 12 Weeks Change Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The use of operant conditioning, including rewards and punishments, in helping a person create an atmosphere where he or she does not contribute to painful stimuli._Earlier in time or order._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::12_Any period of seven consecutive days._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The use of operant conditioning, including rewards and punishments, in helping a person create an atmosphere where he or she does not contribute to painful stimuli.

Concepts.definition: The use of operant conditioning, including rewards and punishments, in helping a person create an atmosphere where he or she does not contribute to painful stimuli.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::12:Any period of seven consecutive days.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have there been any changes t
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have there been any changes to any behavioral interventions in the previous 12 weeks?
